message: Added smart chunking to CaptureIngest. 202K char PDF now splits into 29 overlapping chunks for memory.
Verified 29 chunks with proper overlap. Topic search simulation shows relevance ranking working correctly.
Added speaker detection. Your voice memos now tagged separately from ChatGPT responses for reprocessing.
Reprocessed all 5 archived files. 40 chunks created with speaker detection across 280K chars total.
Voice memos exported to markdown. Pipeline complete with chunking, speaker tags, and query tools.
Created verbal processing continuation with three directions: semantic search, synthesis, and framework extraction.
Fixed name to Doug in continuation prompt and speaker detection patterns.
Session closed. Continuation ready for semantic search, synthesis, or framework extraction.
